Get CARTO Style URL

Source: R/style_helpers.R
carto_style.Rd

Get CARTO Style URL

Usage

carto_style(style_name)

Arguments

style_name

The name of the style (e.g., "voyager", "positron", "dark-matter").

Value

The style URL corresponding to the given style name.
